alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:16AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Beaver, Lipscomb, northeastern Roberts, northern Hemphill and eastern Ochiltree Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1216 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Elmwood to 6 miles west of Lipscomb to 11 miles west of Canadian. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Booker, Follett, Darrouzett, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood and Glazier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
